--

# Making a sequence

--
### (Side note: we're creating vectors here...that's next week!)

--
### Two ways to make a sequence:

--
### 1. Use the `:` operator
### 2. Use the `seq()` function
<br>

--
```{r}
1:10
```

--
```{r}
seq(1, 10)
```

--
```{r}
seq(1, 10, 2)
```

---
# Practice: What will this return?

[60 seconds](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CH50zuS8DD0) - no typing!

```{r, eval=FALSE}
for (i in 1:5) {
    if ((i %% 2) == 0) {
        cat('--')
    } else if ((i %% 3) == 0) {
        cat('----')
    }
    cat(i, '\n')
}
```

--
```
1 
--2 
----3 
--4 
5 
```

---
# Practice: What will this return?

[2 minutes](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=48z7nQaehWI) - no typing!

```{r, eval=FALSE}
n <- 6
for (i in seq(n)) {
    cat('--')
    for (j in seq(1, n, 2)) {
        cat('*')
    }
    cat('--', '\n')
}
```

--
```
--***-- 
--***-- 
--***-- 
--***-- 
--***-- 
--***-- 
```
